Farm Fresh Cupcakes

Yummy

Delicious, beautiful cupcakes and treats

Baked fresh from scratch.

Discover the best cupcakes, cakes, and baked treats in the Shenandoah Valley. For a birthday, dinner party, or just because you want them!

About Us

All of our baked goods are made from scratch using farm fresh, organic ingredients.
We buy eggs from Aisling Hill Farm and our seasonal produce from Marker Miller Orchards and West Oaks Farm Market.

Cupcake Pricing

Filled cupcakes: $35/dozen
Non-filled cupcakes: $28/dozen
Kid favorites: $22/dozen
*Gluten / milk free available at no charge
**Other pricing available by request

Delivery

Delivery charges may apply.
Ask us for details.

Menu

All of our cupcakes are made with farm-fresh ingredients, and can be made gluten-free upon request.

Cravings

Rich, luscious, and just the fix you've been looking for.

Visions of Chocolate

Chocolate cake with a white chocolate filling, your choice of chocolate or classic buttercream, topped with shaved chocolate

Peanut Butter Passion

​Chocolate cake topped with peanut butter buttercream and a pretzel

Salted Caramel Bliss

​Chocolate cake with caramel buttercream and sea salt topping

Bountiful Produce

Delightful treats bursting with fresh—sometimes unexpected—flavors.

Apple Crisp

Apple chunk cake with a cinnamon buttercream, topped with toasted oatmeal crumble

Peter Rabbit

Carrot cake, classic buttercream frosting and candied carrot peels

South Pacific

White cake with a white chocolate coconut filling topped with classic buttercream and fresh coconut flakes

Chocolate Mint

A delectable basil buttercream frosting atop a chocolate cake leaving a mint chocolate taste in your mouth

Seasonal Favorites

Celebrate the four seasons with an assortment of wonderful, colorful cupcake flavors.

Irish Creme

Chocolate cake with an Irish Cream Liqueur buttercream frosting

Strawberry Shortcake

Yellow cake with a strawberry filling, classic buttercream frosting topped with a strawberry​

Lovely Lemon

Lemon cake with a raspberry filling, lemon buttercream and yellow sprinkles or a fresh raspberry

Charlie Brown

Pumpkin cake with classic buttercream frosting

Maple Spice

​Spice cake with maple syrup buttercream topped with nutmeg.

Candy Cane

Chocolate cake topped with candy cane buttercream and a candy cane

Christmas Morning

Gingerbread cake with classic buttercream frosting and topped with a gingerbread cookie

Kid Favorites

We know what kids want. And we have it!

Never Enough Sprinkles

White cake blended with sprinkles topped with classic buttercream icing smothered in cylinder sprinkles

Vanilla

Your choice of a yellow or white cake with either chocolate or classic buttercream frosting

Chocolate

Chocolate cake with your choice of chocolate or classic buttercream frosting

Special Requests

Don't see what you want? That's okay! Send us a note to ask about a special flavor, or about our cakes, mini cupcakes, and other treats.
